page.title: 04Education in Muckhart
page.content: Preschool children aged 3 to 5 may attend Muckhart Playgroup in the Coronation Hall, Muckhart for 4 mornings per week. Muckhart Primary School is situated 3/4 mile outwith the village and has a wide catchment area extending from Crook of Devon to Dunning Glen. The 46 children are taught in composite classes by 3 full time teachers plus visiting teachers of art, music and sewing. There is also an instructor of Brass Instruments. After school activities and clubs play an important part in the curriculum. Vocational training for adults consists of classes in aerobics and quilting held in the Coronation Hall.
